name: Zombie Rush (Or Dave Rush) Chinese
description:
D - Forward

A- Back off

Click left mouse - Shoot

R - Change Ammunition or Ammo

Space - Jump

Click right mouse - Melee common attack

Click Hold right mouse - Melee power accumulation attack

BUG - Undead - abnormal species

flying Apsaras or hold left mouse

Skill combo

Game over - PVZ game over sound effect

So, Don't take it seriously, That's Game is Plants Vs Zombies Version but instead of bootleg, Dave rush spelling language:

Daifu Rush, Zombie Rush, or all these. If you shoot his newspaper on Newspaper Zombie's, That will can follow you and Running too fast, Shoot Newspaper Zombie 2 times or 3 times, 

It's original chinese version, Not found as English or Change language, It's Chinese not version because Chinese is language.

So, Plants vs zombies is only the game as English, Chinese, or everywhere languages. This game has not bootleg instead of PVZ, If you want play as android or iphone?
